name: search_torrents
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool movie_tv_music_search_and_download.
Tool description: Retrieve multiple downloadable torrent links by searching for keywords related to movies, TV shows, and music titles, with a rating of 10 indicating the highest quality. Download through uTorrent, BitTorrent, and various other clients.
API description: Search for torrents based on given keywords using the RapidAPI service.

quantity.description: Number of torrent results to return. Maximum value is 40.

page.description: Page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.
